xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/852373-A Hard Day's Day - A Day in the Life of a Beatles Tribute Band 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/iy9riJPdWI1SIWLNExzehAoB9vH.jpg The mockumentary depicts a day in the life of a Beatles tribute band, shot in the spirit and style of "A Hard Day's Night." In the short, "The MopTops" flee their fans, lose their Ringo (who's Chinese) and when they arrive at their gig, its not what they expected. A Hard Day's Day - A Day in the Life of a Beatles Tribute Band
